data.text:
Where is Algeria?

Algeria is located in the Northern Africa region at latitude 28.033886 and longitude 1.659626 and is part of the African continent.

The DMS coordinates for the center of the country are:

28Â° 2' 1.99'' N

1Â° 39' 34.65'' E

Algeria Neighboring Countries

The neighboring countries of Algeria (DZ) are:

Libya (LY)

Mali (ML)

Mauritania (MR)

Morocco (MA)

Niger (NE)

Tunisia (TN)

Western Sahara (EH)

Maritime Borders

Algeria borders with the Mediterranean Sea.
